name: Cerebral Panic
description:
Two warring ideas battle for a decision in this poor mans head! Two player isometric shooter in which players battle over objectives and fight enemies in order to influence their host's decision.

Random Objectives are selected that each player must complete. The player to complete the objective first gains a point. First to 4 points wins.

Global Game Jam Page - https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/gobblin-disease-6

Credits: 

Jay Hutter - Player Controls, UI, Menu's, Objectives

Jacob Woodman - 3D Modeller, Animations, T.V

Josh Beard - Audio, Logo

Chris Worden - Objectives, Audio

Ben Williams - Level Design

Ramy Abousaif - Objectives, Audio, Shader

All game sounds (original or edited) originated from Soundsnap (https://www.soundsnap.com)
